Package org.mundo.filter

Provides the core classes for content-based filtering.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IActiveFilter  
IFilter Active object filter classes implement this interface.
IFilterConstants Defines constants for filters.
 

Class Summary
ActiveMapFilter A ActiveMapFilter holds a set of attribute filters to be evaluated against passive ActiveMaps.
AttributeFilter AttributeFilter is the abstract base class for attribute filters.
BooleanAttributeFilter BooleanAttributeFilter implements compare operations for Boolean attributes.
CharAttributeFilter CharAttributeFilter implements compare operations for Characters.
CompoundAndFilter  
CompoundAttributeFilter  
CompoundFilter  
CompoundOrFilter  
DoubleAttributeFilter DoubleAttributeFilter implements compare operations for Double attributes.
GenericAttributeFilter GenericAttributeFilter is a generic filter that only implements comparison for equality.
GUIDAttributeFilter GUIDAttributeFilter implements compare operations for GUID attributes.
IntegerAttributeFilter IntegerAttributeFilter implements compare operations for Byte, Short, and Integer attributes.
LongAttributeFilter LongAttributeFilter implements compare operations for Long attributes.
ObjectAttributeFilter ObjectAttributeFilter implements generic compare operations for objects.
StringAttributeFilter StringAttributeFilter implements compare operations for String attributes.
TypedMapFilter A TypedMapFilter holds a set of attribute filters to be evaluated against passive TypedMaps.
 

Package org.mundo.filter Description

Provides the core classes for content-based filtering.
